column2: BRIEF-K12 Inc. Announces Buyback Of 1.83 Million Shares In Private Block Transaction K12 Inc: * K12 INC. ANNOUNCES BUYBACK OF 1.83 MILLION SHARES IN PRIVATE BLOCK TRANSACTION * K12 INC - BUYBACK WAS A ONE-TIME AUTHORIZATION BY K12â€™S BOARD & MADE AT PURCHASE PRICE OF $27.5 MILLION WHICH WILL BE FUNDED WITH CASH ON HAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-K12 Inc Q3 Revenues $232.9 Million April 24 (Reuters) - K12 Inc: * K12 Inc REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 WITH REVENUES OF $232.9 MILLION * Q3 REVENUE $232.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $227.3 MILLION * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE IN THE RANGE OF $906 MILLION TO $912 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN THE RANGE OF $43 MILLION TO $47 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED OPERATING INCOME OF $46 MILLION TO $50 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
